page.title: 08AGRICULTURAL CONTRACTOR
page.content: Although there are 11 farms in this area,90% of the drilling and harvesting are done by the local agricultural contracter.He has all the latest machinery needed like{John {Deere}combine harvesters{,Massey {Ferguson's}and{Moreau}sugar beet harvester. This last machine can travel at 4-5 m.p.h.(against 3 m.p.h. for the British machines.)Seed pellets are now made of identical size and contain their own fertiliser.Seeds travel at 40 m.p.h. down the pipes into the ground.Farming is highly mechanised in this area and therefore the agricultural contractor is a valuable person as a beet drill and tractor aione can cost as much as Â£32,000. hedge timming, harvesting and hay making as well as sowing many crops come under the wing of the contractor.
